short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will hopefully display any broken images from the PGM classes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basically, the images for the PGM Coursera class seem to have disappeared, and all this plugin does is retrieve them from a cache distributed with this extension.
